title: F/S or Trade A35 Album Page
author: TheBig6

posts.post_title: F/S or Trade A35 Album Page
posts.post_content:
I have this goodwin A35 Album Page for sale or trade.
Players are Murphy/Slattery/Crane/Hatfield
The page has some condition issues around the edges but overall a nice impressive piece with great eye appeal.
It is slabbed Authentic by Beckett, the man I bought it from said he requested the authentic grade instead of number. I'm just telling you what he told me. I see no reason it wouldn't have got a number grade
Actually, I wish it wasn't in the slab as it would look great matted and framed as you could matte out the edge flaws.
Card has each players 1888 stats on the back
Anyway 465.00 shipped or trade offers accepted
Paypal OK
